title: betnomi
author: betnomi
created_time: December 19, 2022, 07:13:42 AMLast edit: May 17, 2023, 12:26:27 PM by betnomi
content: It's me again! This is a New Year's tour, thanks to which the Custom Cold Wallet will find its new owner!This RAFFLE is also dedicated to the annual "Bitcointalk Community Awards" event where Betnomi was invited to be a sponsor! Good luck!I will announce the block number when we are full.Your forum account must be registered no later than September 1 of the current year.We may, at our discretion, ignore applies (including inactive posters, etc).How this will work:Choose a number between 00 - 99 (no random)Can take two slots if you voted in the topic Bitcointalk Community Awards üèÜAfter I choose a block, the last symbol of the hash will determine the winner.00 - Darker4501 - shasan02 - xandry03 - Willi997404 - Woodie05 - 5tift06 - TopTort77707 - QB08 - Woodie09 - Real-Duke10 - NeuroticFish11 - sam0012 - sam0013 - HeRetiK14 - mole081515 - ChiBitCTy16 - bitbollo17 - naira18 - Inagame19 - doblezero20 - ChiBitCTy21 - The_Crypto_Kid22 - YodasRedRocket23 - hopenotlate24 - ajiz13825 - bestcoin_5926 - mojo27 - Pmalek28 - Dernoste29 - LitLitBit30 - Hotdog731 - bitbollo32 - Ryu_Ar133 - Inwestour34 - examplens35 - Pinky123436 - NeuroticFish37 - Mauser38 - Fundamentals39 - vd30940 - pakitheboss41 - naira42 - tweetious43 - cygan44 - Danydee45 - mocacinno46 - Nara189247 - Mbitr48 - Steeley49 - minerjones50 - minerjones51 - Ratimov52 - Becassine53 - julerz1254 - digicoinuser55 - kryptowerk56 - Remsjack57 - Ryu_Ar158 - rat03gopoh59 - m201760 - m201761 - rat03gopoh62 - hyudien63 - Mauser64 - Hedgefx65 - PGO66 - Soonandwaite67 - TheBeardedBaby68 - Nara189269 - notblox170 - ajiz13871 - dcarter72 - pakitheboss73 - Iv4n74 - Willi997475 - Kryptowerk76 - The_Crypto_Kid77 - cygan78 - please79 - salad daging80 - Timelord206781 - GazetaBitcoin82 - Dernoste83 - haloxon84 - Koal-8485 - dcarter86 - examplens87 - Crytocanuk88 - Buchi-8889 - salad daging90 - JanEmil91 - JanEmil92 - PawGo93 - PM-ICT94 - owlcatz95 - sunny96 - notblox197 - hopenotlate98 - bullrun2020bro99 - bullrun2020broPlease let me know if the raffle rules need to be improved ü¶ä
